dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text: Having you embrace me like this, it makes me very happy.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text: [Player]-san, I've caught you in my hands!

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Ehehe...!
Being with [Player]-san like this,
it makes my heart pound but also calms me down...

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
The only one I can feel this safe
being selfish with is you, [Player]-san...

[Player] and Yohack forgot about the
summer heat and huddled close.

And, Yohack's damp nose
and [Player]'s mouth gently touched.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
[Player]-san!
With you on my back,
I want us to go even further!

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
I'll speed up a bit, so
please put this on just in case!

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Of course, I won't
drop you into the sea, though.

Having said that, Yohack put the
life jacket he was wearing on [Player].

Then, he put [Player] on his back,
and started the jet ski.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Ehehe...!
Being able to watch fireworks with you like this,
I'm incredibly happy...!

[Player] and Yohack continued to enjoy the
fireworks while gliding across the sea.

Where the two headed,
only the jet ski cutting
through the waves will ever know.
